QuestData.Title: Skycaller Slaughter
QuestData.Description:
Some among the faithless are gifted with the ability to command the storm. They call themselves skycallers, and they use their magic to summon great spires that turn the earth into sand.
Skycallers are the only ones capable of summoning these spires. If you kill the skycallers, you also kill the sethrak's ability to expand their warcamps.
QuestData.LogDescription: Kill $1oa Sethrak Skycallers at the Temple Incursion.
